title: Limited sound on Elise
body: When you activate some abilities on Elise they don't make a sound on cast.

replies.body: This should have been fixed last week. Lemme know if you're still having issues! ^-^
I think they reported this on PBE already. Riot is maybe working on fixing it.
Having the same problem. my auto attacks and q have no SFX, in both human and spider form.
